General.Name: Telefonica Chile S.A.
General.Description: Telefónica Chile S.A. operates as a telecommunication company. The company offers fixed telephony services, including basic telephony services; line connections and installations; value-added services; broadband, dedicated lines, and international long-distance services; sales of terminal equipment; and rental of circuit media; and business communications services, such as sale and lease of telecommunications equipment; sales of networks to corporate clients; lease of networks associated with public or private projects; and data transmission services. It also provides satellite television services, broadband services, individual pay services, multiple basic channels, video on demand, and interactive or multimedia television services, as well as logistics, and personnel and administration services. The company was formerly known as Compañía de Telecomunicaciones de Chile S.A. and changed its name to Telefónica Chile S.A. in April 2009. Telefónica Chile S.A. was founded in 1880 and is headquartered in Santiago, Chile. Telefónica Chile S.A. is a subsidiary of Telefonica Moviles Chile S.A.
